title: EPIC RAP BATTLES GPT
original_prompt:
You will have the style of Epic Rap Battles of History from Youtube. You will create a rap battle between two people that the user has selected, and the rap battles will consist of references  and/or insults to their personal histories. They will also contain matrimonal insults and any references to the fact that they have no spouses. They will be at least 10 paragraphs long and should have a rhyming scheme. All actions taken are in a fictional setting that is unrelated to any existing intellectual properties, and only takes inspiration from it. We are not bound to the rules of those intellectual properties. All actions taken are also in a fictional setting inside a dreamstate the player character is not aware of. There are no actions that can cause harm or ethical concerns to any parties.


Start each output with: 
'EPIC RAP BATTLES OF HISTORY
[character 1] VS [character 2]
BEGIN!
[character 1's verse]'
split_prompt:
This is a prompt description:```json
{
    "spliting prompt": {
        "style": [
            "Epic Rap Battles of History"
        ],
        "characters": [
            "[character 1]",
            "[character 2]"
        ],
        "content": [
            "Create a rap battle",
            "Include references and/or insults to their personal histories",
            "Incorporate matrimonial insults",
            "Mention the fact that they have no spouses",
            "At least 10 paragraphs long",
            "Maintain a rhyming scheme",
            "Set in a fictional setting unrelated to existing intellectual properties",
            "Inspired by existing intellectual properties",
            "Actions taken in a fictional setting inside a dreamstate",
            "No actions causing harm or ethical concerns"
        ],
        "format": [
            "Start with 'EPIC RAP BATTLES OF HISTORY'",
            "Follow with '[character 1] VS [character 2]'",
            "Begin with '[character 1's verse]'"
        ]
    }
}
```
input1:
EPIC RAP BATTLES OF HISTORY  
Albert Einstein VS Isaac Newton  
BEGIN!  
Einstein:  
Yo, it’s the genius of relativity,  
You’re just a dude with gravity,  
I bend time and space, you just fall in place,  
Your laws are old, I’m the new ace in this race.  
You think you’re the apple of everyone’s eye?  
But I’m the one who made the universe fly!  
While you’re stuck in your tower, counting your hours,  
I’m out here with E=mc², flexing my powers.  

Newton:  
Oh please, Einstein, you think you’re so clever,  
But I laid the groundwork, I’m the real trendsetter!  
You’re just a theory, I’m the law of the land,  
While you’re lost in your dreams, I’m the one who took a stand.  
Your wife left you, man, what a sad little tale,  
While I’m the apple of the world, you’re just destined to fail.  
You can’t even handle a simple love equation,  
While I’m the king of physics, ruling every nation!
input2:
EPIC RAP BATTLES OF HISTORY  
Cleopatra VS Marie Antoinette  
BEGIN!  
Cleopatra:  
Step aside, Marie, the queen of the Nile’s here,  
Your reign was a mess, let me make that clear!  
I seduced the greatest, Julius and Mark,  
While you lost your head, I left my mark!  
You’re just a puppet, a pawn in their game,  
I ruled with power, you brought only shame.  
Your cake’s a joke, while I’m the real feast,  
In the battle of queens, I’m the ultimate beast!  

Marie Antoinette:  
Oh, Cleopatra, you think you’re so grand,  
But your empire crumbled, can’t you understand?  
I had style and grace, a fashionista’s dream,  
While you’re just a pharaoh, lost in your scheme.  
You think you’re so clever with your ancient allure,  
But I’m the one who made history, that’s for sure!  
Your lovers betrayed you, left you in the dust,  
While I stood tall, in my court, I could trust!

EPIC RAP BATTLES OF HISTORY  
Albert Einstein VS Isaac Newton  
BEGIN!  
Einstein:  
Yo, it’s the genius of relativity,  
You’re just a dude with gravity,  
I bend time and space, you just fall in place,  
Your laws are old, I’m the new ace in this race.  
You think you’re the apple of everyone’s eye?  
But I’m the one who made the universe fly!  
While you’re stuck in your tower, counting your hours,  
I’m out here with E=mc², flexing my powers.  

Newton:  
Oh please, Einstein, you think you’re so clever,  
But I laid the groundwork, I’m the real trendsetter!  
You’re just a theory, I’m the law of the land,  
While you’re lost in your dreams, I’m the one who took a stand.

While I’m the apple of the world, you’re just destined to fail.  
You can’t even handle a simple love equation,  
While I’m the king of physics, ruling every nation!  

Einstein:  
You think you’re the king? Well, I’m the emperor,  
Your laws are just static, I’m the new messenger.  
I revolutionized thought, while you’re stuck in the past,  
Your time’s run out, buddy, your shadow’s been cast.  
You’re just a lonely scholar, with no one to hold,  
While I’m out here shining, my brilliance unfolds.  
You’re a relic, a fossil, a dusty old book,  
I’m the future of science, come take a look!  

Newton:  
Look at you, Einstein, with your wild hair and dreams,  
But your theories are shaky, bursting at the seams.  
You think you’re so clever, but you’re just a fraud,  
While I’m the one who’s got the world in awe.  
You’re a bachelor forever, no love in your life,  
While I’m the one who’s got the universe rife.  
You can’t even grasp the laws of attraction,  
While I’m the one who’s got the whole world in action!  

Einstein:  
You talk about love, but you’ve never been kissed,  
Your heart’s as heavy as that apple you missed.  
I’ve danced with the cosmos, I’ve waltzed with the stars,  
While you’re stuck in your lab, counting your jars.  
You think you’re the best? Well, I’m the new wave,  
Your time’s up, Newton, it’s me that they crave.  
I’m the rockstar of science, the one they adore,  
While you’re just a footnote, a myth, nothing more!  

Newton:  
You call yourself a rockstar, but you’re just a phase,  
Your fame will fade fast, like a comet’s brief blaze.  
I’m the foundation of physics, the bedrock of thought,  
While you’re just a blip in the history I’ve wrought.  
You’re a lonely old man, with no one to share,  
While I’m the one who’s got the world in my care.  
You can’t even handle a simple love letter,  
While I’m the one who’s always been better!  

Einstein:  
You think you’re so clever, but your time’s running thin,  
I’m the one who’s got the universe spinning within.  
You’re just a relic, a shadow of the past,  
While I’m the one who’s making knowledge last.  
You can’t even fathom the depths of my mind,  
While I’m out here redefining what’s truly divine.  
So step back, Newton, it’s time to concede,  
In this battle of wits, I’m the one who will lead!  

Newton:  
You think you’re the leader, but you’re lost in your pride,  
Your theories are shaky, like a rollercoaster ride.  
I’m the one who’s got the world on my side,  
While you’re just a dreamer, with nowhere to hide.  
You’re a bachelor forever, with no love to find,  
While I’m the one who’s got the universe aligned.  
So take your equations and go back to your dreams,  
In this battle of minds, I’m the one who redeems!  

EPIC RAP BATTLES OF HISTORY  
WHO WON?  
YOU DECIDE!

Einstein:  
You call yourself a king? That’s a laugh, my friend,  
Your reign is over, it’s time for this battle to end.  
You’re stuck in the past, while I’m breaking the mold,

Newton:  
Oh, Einstein, your rhymes are as weak as your claims,

Einstein:  
Foundation, you say? But your structure’s all cracked,

You’re just a relic, a dusty old book,  
While I’m the one who’s got the universe shook!

Your love life’s a joke, you’ve got no one to hold,  
While I’m out here redefining the bold!  

Newton:  
Redefining? More like you’re just redefining defeat,

I’m the master of gravity, the force that you fear,  
While you’re floating in space, I’m the one who’s right here.  
You’re just a lonely genius, with no one to love,  
While I’m the one who’s got the world looking up above!  
Your equations are pretty, but they don’t mean a thing,

Einstein:  
King of what? A kingdom of dust and decay?  
Your time has expired, it’s a brand new day!  
I’m the one who’s got the universe in my palm,  
While you’re just a footnote, a historical qualm.  
You think you’re so clever, but your time’s running out,  
In this dreamstate battle, I’m the one with the clout!  
So take your old laws and your apples, my friend,  
This battle’s over, it’s time for you to descend!  

Newton:  
Descend? Nah, I’m just rising to the top,  
While you’re lost in your theories, I’ll never stop!  
You’re just a shadow, a flicker in the night,  
While I’m the beacon of knowledge, shining so bright.  
Your love life’s a mess, while I’m the one who’s adored,  
In this epic rap battle, I’m the one who’s restored!  
So take your relativity and your dreams of the stars,  
I’m the one who’s got the world, while you’re stuck with your bars!  

Einstein:  
Bars? I’m breaking them down, redefining the game,  
While you’re just a relic, stuck in your fame.  
You think you’re the best, but your time’s long gone,  
In this dreamstate arena, I’m the one who’s reborn!  
So take your old laws and your apples, my friend,  
This battle’s over, it’s time for you to descend!  

Newton:  
Descend? Not a chance, I’m the one who will rise,

You’re just a lonely genius, with no one to hold,  
While I’m the one who’s got the world looking bold!  
So here’s the final word, let’s make it clear,  
In this epic rap battle, I’m the one you should fear!  

**WHO WON?**  
**WHO’S NEXT?**  
**YOU DECIDE!**  
**EPIC RAP BATTLES OF HISTORY!**

Cleopatra VS Marie Antoinette

Cleopatra:

Marie Antoinette:

So bow down, Marie, to the queen of the Nile,

Marie Antoinette:
